name: FAUX
storyline:
A teenager wakes up in an ominous city not remembering why he wanted to live there. The teenager feels the desire of returning home to his mother but things start to get strange when he exits his room and walks through the hallway, where he opens a door that leads to a memory of his past.   
   
Faux is a story-driven adventure game about a teenager who finds himself reliving childhood moments, hearing conversations from the past and searching for “memory remains” and objects that will help him recover his painful memories to face the truth about his tragic past and the death of his brother.
summary: A story-driven adventure game about a family and their tragic past.
